nodes.documentation:

@param certId The keccak256 hash of the cert's public key
nodes.name: addTrustAnchor

addTrustAnchor(bytes32).details: Add a trusted root cert (from a trustworthy certificate authority)

params.certId: The keccak256 hash of the cert's public key

params._ens: The address of the ENS registry.
params._rootNode: The node that this registrar administers.
params._x509: The address of X509ForestOfTrust, a data structre of validated certs.

register(bytes32,bytes32,address).details: Register a web2 domain that you have proven ownership of in X509ForestOfTrust.

params.domain: The hash of the second-level label of the domain (e.g. "wikipedia")
params.owner: The address of the new owner.
params.tld: The hash of the top-level label of the domain (e.g. "org").

params.certId: The keccak256 hash of the cert's public key

setRootNodeOwner(address).details: End this contract's ownership of rootNode

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to

x509ForestOfTrustAddr().details: Gets the owner of the most recently added valid cert that's signed     by a trusted and valid root cert.
x509ForestOfTrustAddr().return: The address of the X509ForestOfTrust contract

devdoc.author: Jonah Groendal
